channel.title: SotW?
channel.description: So, it was said that this was coming back. I haven't seen it since the first time we did it. Is there any news on this?

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:22, topic:521630”]I’d rather wait for Frell and SilentCJ’s inputs on it since they’re our resident graphics geniuses. It’d bring some activity to this board again though, which is a good thing.[/quote]Yeah, I would too. I wouldn’t want to instate this without consulting them about it first. They were the first ones to be controlling it (can’t remember if SilentCJ helped), so I’m sure they’d like to continue it. Yeah, that is a good thing, I love the graphics board, and I wish it were more active than it is.

[quote=“Davidi2, post:23, topic:521630”]Seems silly to have a SotW on a site that doesnt allow images in signatures[/quote]We could call it GotW.

Read full topic

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

I sure hope so. Because the last time we tried this, it was chaotic:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

EDIT:
If we are to do this again, I suggest a massive template update, because it was poorly designed. Somewhat like the one Frell did.

Read full topic

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Well, when we start it back up if that happens we can take action on it. There’s been quite a few badges handed out so hopefully their opinions have changed :).

Read full topic

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

I fail to see how that system could be troublesome. It’s not even something worth the time to fuss about, as Ruby said it’s only for one week/until the next competition is held.

Read full topic

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:17, topic:521630”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=640142.msg4314030#msg4314030 date=1371163215]

What were they complaining about? Because they lost and someone got the badge for the week?
[/quote]Yes. They had also talked about I didn’t deserve it. (I’m not sure about the other ones)

I’m not sure how the last competition was ran because I wasn’t around yet, but why don’t we have the community vote? Participants are allowed to vote for themselves, and if the community does the deciding then you can’t blame a group of judges for being biased.[/quote]That’s how it was handled. Then some of the staff were the final judges, I believe.

Read full topic

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:16, topic:521630”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=640142.msg4314028#msg4314028 date=1371163116]
What were they complaining about? Because they lost and someone got the badge for the week?
[/quote]Yes. They had also talked about I didn’t deserve it. (I’m not sure about the other ones)[/quote]
I’m not sure how the last competition was ran because I wasn’t around yet, but why don’t we have the community vote? Participants are allowed to vote for themselves, and if the community does the deciding then you can’t blame a group of judges for being biased.

Read full topic

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:15, topic:521630”]What were they complaining about? Because they lost and someone got the badge for the week?[/quote]Yes. They had also talked about I didn’t deserve it and were acting “penisy” since I got it. (I’m not sure about the other ones)

[size=1pt]lmao “cock” gets changed to penis[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

What were they complaining about? Because they lost and someone got the badge for the week?

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:12, topic:521630”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=640142.msg4314020#msg4314020 date=1371162682]

…Custom title?

How is that any different from a badge, just instead of a picture it is text?
[/quote]People lose their minds over a picture. It’s less noticeable if it’s just text. Also, any winnings from the SotW will cause people to get upset, and cause hostility.

You’re contradicting yourself. A custom title is a reward, which you just said people would fuss about.
Again I bring up the idea of a stickied tutorial for the winner until the next competition is held. It isn’t permanent, and it gives the winner just enough recognition by those who care to visit the graphics section.[/quote]
Yes, but it appears that a reward is going to be given regardless of my opinion. So, I might as well partake in the ideas. People would also fuss about your idea. People are going to fuss regardless, that’s inevitable.

[quote=“Ruby, post:13, topic:521630”]I thought the badge was quite nice…[/quote]Yes, I liked it too. It caused me to not participate in the other(s) though, as everyone would fuss and complain about it. If people would be a little mature about the badge, then it wouldn’t do any harm.

Read full topic

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I thought the badge was quite nice…

Read full topic

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:11, topic:521630”][quote author=Flame_ link=topic=640142.msg4314019#msg4314019 date=1371162593]

…Custom title?

How is that any different from a badge, just instead of a picture it is text?
[/quote]People lose their minds over a picture. It’s less noticeable if it’s just text. Also, any winnings from the SotW will cause people to get upset, and cause hostility.[/quote]
You’re contradicting yourself. A custom title is a reward, which you just said people would fuss about.
Again I bring up the idea of a stickied tutorial for the winner until the next competition is held. It isn’t permanent, and it gives the winner just enough recognition by those who care to visit the graphics section.

Read full topic

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:10, topic:521630”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=640142.msg4314017#msg4314017 date=1371162497]
…Custom title?
[/quote]
How is that any different from a badge, just instead of a picture it is text?[/quote]People lose their minds over a picture. It’s less noticeable if it’s just text. Also, any winnings from the SotW will cause people to get upset, and cause hostility. So, in reality, any winnings from someone being decent with GFX isn’t very smart in my opinion.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Travas:

The badge would cause more harm than anything, if this were to happen, it would probably be best without the badge.

I’ll post because I’d probably be interested in making something.

What would you consider be a better alternative? I wouldn’t be the one to support making an announcement in the announcements section for the winner, as I’ve always liked seeing those sort of sections reserved for changes on the forums/new staff. Perhaps the winner gets to host the next competition and make a tutorial on how they made their SOTW, which is stickied with a download until the next winner is announced?

Read full topic

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Yes, people were pissed about the badge every single time. That’s what kind of made me not enter in the other(s), and just the first.

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Yes, there was a badge involved. Yes, people got upset over the badge. Quite frankly, I would care not to have a badge involved, but if it was - I wouldn’t care regardless. Badge or not, I’d love to see this come back.

Read full topic

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

Wasn’t there a badge involved? If I remember correctly, people were getting upset over the badge etc which is why it never worked. Correct me if I’m wrong, though.

Read full topic

item.title: SotW?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Yes, I remember that. It was said that it would come back “when the board gets more popular”, and what-not. I’ve always loved it. I hope we can get some supporters for it so we can bring it back.

Read full topic

item.description:

It could be started back up if enough interest was generated to be sure there would be entries, there just wasn’t enough interest before.
